mng: bow case or scabbard, to hide, military strategy

exm.mng: bow case or scabbard, to hide, military strategy
to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom), to hide one's light under a bushel
military strategy, military tactics, originally refers to military classics Six Secret Teachings 六韜|六韬 and Three Strategies三略
